attributes.name: transfer

attributes.type: function (struct Saturn.Player storage pointer,struct Saturn.InternalBuyEvent memory,uint256)

attributes.documentation:
@dev Buy token using ETH
Player sends ETH to this contract, then his token balance will be increased based on price.
The total supply will also be increased.
Player need 0.01 ETH register fee to register this address (first time buy).
The buy amount need between 0.000000001ETH and 100000ETH

attributes.type: function (struct Saturn.Player storage pointer,struct Saturn.InternalBuyEvent memory,uint256)

attributes.documentation: @dev Buy the token
attributes.name: buy

attributes.documentation: @dev Handle the pot (share, final, lucky and dealer)
attributes.name: handlePot

attributes.type: function (uint256,uint256,struct Saturn.Player storage pointer,struct Saturn.InternalBuyEvent memory)

attributes.documentation:
@dev Handle lucky pot. The player can lucky pot by random number. The maximum amount will be half of total lucky pot
The lucky reward will be added to player's eth balance
attributes.name: handleLuckyPot
